metadata.name: Memories
metadata.description:
Life's biggest event happened when I was taking original pictures of "Memories", and years later.

Looking back at this photo, I remember having great time with my fellow photographer friends at Tokyo back in late 2019, and me trying to cope with the worst depression yet in my life.

"Memories" could be just another image that was taken in Tokyo for many people, but for myself- it was one of the pictures that pulled me out from the pit.


- First collector will receive framed still image of this NFT

- Owner of this NFT gets full copyright of this NFT.
(Exception: The creator using it as part of the portfolio)

- When it gets an request to be displayed on a gallery, the request will be sent to the owner of the NFT for a permission.
